Routine Descriptions

KGY_CK_GAPS

 [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 FUNCTION:
       kgy_ck_gaps
 PURPOSE:
       Returns times of gaps in the ck kernel due to altitude manoeuvres
 CALLING SEQUENCE:
       in_gaps = kgy_ck_gaps( times )
 INPUT:
       time array
 OUTPUT:
       in gaps (1) or out of gaps (0)
 CREATED BY:
       Yuki Harada on 2018-05-15
